column1: These are our favorite animals here at the Atlanta Zoo. It's Dolly and Seymour. They are beluga whales. These whales live mostly in the Arctic region-
Anyone have any questions about the creek we're about to cross?
Come in by the waterfall, gang!
Wo wants sandwiches?  We got ...turkey.  Ham.  Turkey ham.
That's not herpes, it's a cold sore.
...Aand right up here you can see a red-bellied chickadee. They're indigenous to this area.
Welcome to Spooky Laboratory.  I'm your guide, Dr. Spookalot. Allow me to show around the lab.

Throughout 1861 the Confederate authorities tried to drive out the Union occupants of Fort Sumter peacefully. But Abraham Lincoln's administration would not surrender the fort to the Confederates, so Jefferson Davis decided to take action.
Yes.  Imagine what it must have been like: you're a Union soldier stationed at this fort, and one day, you look out and see thousands of Confederates ready to pounce on you.  Uh...
